name: Lawsuit Motions
description: Find and access Motions validated in lawsuits from different courts in Brazil through a simplified search. Reference for the elaboration of legal arguments.

name: Web ERP app for Samsung
description: A multi-module Web ERP application for the HR department of a Samsung's local factory in Manaus/AM, Brazil.

name: AR/VR SDK
description: Kotlin SDK for Android for building AR and VR apps. Ported from existing Javascript SDK from Microsoft.

name: Web Dashboard
description: An internal Web dashboard application for Samsung that displays information of its HQs all around the world.

name: Samsung XR Service
description: Android embedded service for building Mixed Reality applications for next gen. AR Glasses.

name: "Self-service" kiosk
description: Android application to the biggest retail market store of the region.

name: EDK
description: Educational software for the Android and Web platforms whose main focus is to create and apply digital tests for students in places with no or little internet connection.

name: SFAP
description: Internal web application that helps the managers to trace every production line of the factory.
